entry.title: AD10 (earth baby fox)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Animal Decors
Price: 9.50

E A R T H collection: our designer has created these beautiful Mama Baby animal sets representing Mother and Earth as creators. All our earth inspired animals are hand felted with careful detailed embroidery that represents Sun, Moon and Harvest. All our earth inspired animals would make a lovely gift for all.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 5.5” tall x 7” long

Please note that this Dog is for decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: ESD-3 (baby sheep)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Animal Decors
Price: 15.00

If you enjoy nature and animals then this baby Sheep will liven up the kids' room or any room. This baby sheep is an absolute pleasure to add farmhouse touch, while also keeping it eco-friendly. Every small details on face, ears and tail are hand-embroidered and needle felted to bring each piece to life. This simple, yet adorable decor creates peaceful and harmonious environment to any room or can be a special gift for any occasions. 

  • Handmade with 100% wool
  • Design in Canada. Handmade in Nepal
  • Perfect gift for all ages and all year round
  • For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy

SIZE: 6” tall x 7 long
CARE: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from
their appearance on your display, as it depends on your
monitor settings.

entry.title: ECB-1 (loone w/baby)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Animal Decors
Price: 14.00

If you enjoy nature and animals then this mama with baby loone will liven up the kids' room and any room. It will add fun touch in the house. This will make a lovely gift for any age, because it represents the beauty of animal world, and is crafted using high-quality wool. Common loons are the most widespread and well-known species of loon in North America. They are really really good divers and babies like to go for rides on their parent's back. They are just so adorable and well loved by all campers and bird lovers.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 7.5” tall x 8.5 long

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.
